org.bytedeco.nvcodec.nvencodeapi

Class NV_ENC_CONFIG

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
      • org.bytedeco.nvcodec.nvencodeapi.NV_ENC_CONFIG
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    @Properties(inherit=nvencodeapi.class)
public class NV_ENC_CONFIG
extends Pointer
    \struct _NV_ENC_CONFIG Encoder configuration parameters to be set during initialization.

        @ByRef
public GUID profileGUID()
        [in]: Specifies the codec profile GUID. If client specifies \p NV_ENC_CODEC_PROFILE_AUTOSELECT_GUID the NvEncodeAPI interface will select the appropriate codec profile.

      • profileGUID

      • gopLength

        @Cast(value="uint32_t")
public int gopLength()
        [in]: Specifies the number of pictures in one GOP. Low latency application client can set goplength to NVENC_INFINITE_GOPLENGTH so that keyframes are not inserted automatically.

      • gopLength

        public NV_ENC_CONFIG gopLength(int setter)

      • frameIntervalP

        @Cast(value="int32_t")
public int frameIntervalP()
        [in]: Specifies the GOP pattern as follows: \p frameIntervalP = 0: I, 1: IPP, 2: IBP, 3: IBBP If goplength is set to NVENC_INFINITE_GOPLENGTH \p frameIntervalP should be set to 1.

      • frameIntervalP

        public NV_ENC_CONFIG frameIntervalP(int setter)

      • frameFieldMode

        @Cast(value="NV_ENC_PARAMS_FRAME_FIELD_MODE")
public int frameFieldMode()
        [in]: Specifies the frame/field mode. Check support for field encoding using ::NV_ENC_CAPS_SUPPORT_FIELD_ENCODING caps. Using a frameFieldMode other than NV_ENC_PARAMS_FRAME_FIELD_MODE_FRAME for RGB input is not supported.

      • frameFieldMode

        public NV_ENC_CONFIG frameFieldMode(int setter)
